biotools.summary: Efficacy of the KLab interspecies tiling program which was demonstrated by interrogating the endogenous and human protamine loci in a transgenic mouse line. Species specific probe sets were designed by adapting a previously reported maskless array synthesis strategy.

bioschemas.name: Array Design
